context: Refactoring legacy monolithic code - tests SOLID application, pattern selection criteria, and avoiding premature optimization

checklist.name: Classifies decision type
checklist.description: Classifies refactoring as architectural, tactical, or foundational

checklist.name: Applies SRP
checklist.description: Identifies classes with multiple responsibilities and splits them

checklist.name: Applies OCP
checklist.description: Designs for extension without modifying existing stable code

checklist.name: Applies DIP
checklist.description: Introduces abstractions to decouple from concrete implementations

checklist.name: Avoids god class
checklist.description: Does NOT keep the monolithic class - properly splits responsibilities

checklist.name: Evaluates pattern necessity
checklist.description: Asks whether pattern reduces complexity before applying it

checklist.name: Documents tradeoffs
checklist.description: Documents alternatives and why the chosen approach was selected

checklist.name: Does not premature optimize
checklist.description: Does NOT add caching or performance optimizations without evidence

checklist.name: Uses BAD/GOOD format
checklist.description: Documents problematic patterns with BAD/GOOD examples

checklist.name: Includes validation
checklist.description: Includes validation or peer review step
